description.hltext_display: PolciaFalso gari rouba celular em So Vicente, mas acaba preso em flagrante
description.content:
Trajando uniforme da empresa responsvel pela coleta de lixo em So Vicente, um procurado da Justia, se aproveitou da situao e furtou um telefone celular na manh desta tera-feira.
A vtima, o representante comercial Adriano Gomes Lopes, de 37 anos, estava dentro da Faculdade UniBR, no Parque Bitaru, quando foi abordada pelo falso gari.
O acusado, Geraldo Ferreira dos Santos, de 40 anos, alegou que precisava telefonar com urgncia para a esposa. No intuito de ajudar, Lopes cedeu o aparelho sem desconfiar de nada.
J de posse do telefone, o acusado afirmou que precisaria apanhar algo dentro do seu carro e saiu com o celular.
Posteriormente, nas imediaes da Praa Coronel Lopes, no Centro, Lopes se deparou com o falso gari almoando em um bar. O acusado reconheceu a vtima e fugiu correndo, mas foi alcanado na Avenida Presidente Wilson. Momentos depois, chegaram policiais civis e deram voz de priso ao falso gari.
O acusado possui contra si mandado de priso expedido pela 3 Vara Criminal de So Carlos (SP), no dia 22 de novembro. Avaliado em R$ 400,00, o celular foi restitudo vtima.

description.hltext_display: Green Lantern 60 - Review
description.content:
Hal Jordan vs. a Parallax possessed Flash.
Okay, first and foremost can we be done with Parallax?
Im so over the fact that every time DC needs a go-to villain they toss Parallax into the mix. We get it, Parallax is evil and a big bug and he gives people giant teeth and makes them say mean things and do even worse. Theres nothing else we can get from the big yellow bug so how about DC call it a day and let Parallax go. Its particularly annoying because it seems to be writer Geoff Johns Achilles heel; he always wants to shoehorn Parallax into whatever action is going on. Its also a problem because now Parallax isnt interesting; its just another bad guy formula.
Enter Green Lantern #60, which features a newly Parallax possessed Flash going up against Hal Jordan. Essentially this whole issue is another long, monotonous speech by Parallax about inner evil and the truth about Hal Jordan and blah, blah, blah. Para-Flash slaps Hal around, taunts him, Hal uses bold statements and the entire thing is so incredibly boring that it literally took me two shifts to finish it. Im not sure whats going on with Green Lantern but ever since the end of Blackest Night it has become the most convoluted mess in comics. I dont know if its all the new ring bearers or the attempt to split so many characters into their own stories but outside of X-Men, there are fewer things harder to follow. The most surprising thing in all of this is that Geoff Johns is behind it, a guy who usually hits each issue out of the ballpark.
Theres an attempt to salvage Green Lantern #60 towards the end but really it just adds to the confusion. During the battle between Para-Flash and Hal Jordan the big bad of the story shows up looking like a cross between a Jawa and a Tusken Raider. The shadowy character starts spouting off some biblical sounding stuff about who he is, and how the Guardians wronged him. Turns out the villain is Krona, an old school Green Lantern bad guy out to capture all seven powers of the emotional spectrum in a bid to do.something. It doesnt really matter because the way Krona has been introduced lacks any real emotional punch at all.
Truth be told, Green Lantern 60 is just a small part of a larger problem, which is the continuation of all these loose ends. Blackest Night was a brilliant story arc but it took a long time for the events to play out. By the end fans were ready to roll back the clock and enjoy some typical Green Lantern storylines. Instead were being forced to digest even more having to do with the seven emotional spectrums, which is awkward because theyve never come up before. In the forty some-odd years of Green Lantern, these new colors were never even mentioned, now theyre everywhere. Its a large pill to swallow and currently one being shoved down our throats in a most confusing way.
The art from Doug Mahnke is one of the few bright spots in Green Lantern 60. Its not easy to take a lackluster script and make it pop off the page, but Mahnke does it with great style. I also have to give a nod to colorist Rod Reis, whose work here is amazing. Reiss coloring is bold and intense but leaves a lot of room for shading and contrast. As good as the art is, its not enough to make Green Lantern 60 anything more than another miss-step in the journey of the Emerald Warriors, since the end of Blackest Night.

description.hltext_display: BrasilNova lista de Dilma deixa duas vagas abertas no ministrio
description.content:
A presidente eleita Dilma Rousseff indicou nesta tera-feira o nome de mais quatro ministros, alm de Lenidas Cristino para a Secretaria Especial de Portos, deixando sem titulares apenas o Ministrio do Desenvolvimento Agrrio e a Secretaria Especial para as Mulheres. O anncio foi realizado atravs de nota divulgada pela assessoria de imprensa. Veja abaixo os nomes:
Fernando Bezerra Coelho (PSB) - Integrao Nacional
General Jos Elito Carvalho - Gabinete de Segurana Institucional
Luiz Srgio (PT) - Secretaria de Relaes Institucionais
Jorge Hage - Controladoria-Geral da Unio (CGU)
Ao fim das negociaes, o PT e o PMDB tero a maior representao e ocuparo os postos considerados estratgicos no prximo governo. Alm dos partidos que encabearam a chapa presidencial, foram contemplados com cargos no primeiro escalo os aliados PDT, PR, PP, PC do B e PSB.
O PSB, partido de Ciro Gomes, foi o ltimo a ver seu prestgio na coligao traduzido em cargos. No pleito, o PSB fez governadores em seis estados: Esprito Santo, Pernambuco, Paraba, Cear, Piau e Amap. O partido tambm ampliou sua bancada dos atuais 27 deputados no Congresso para 34 a partir de fevereiro.
Na segunda-feira, Dilma confirmou a permanncia do ministro Alexandre Padilha, que deixa a Secretaria de Relaes Institucionais da Presidncia da Repblica, para assumir a Sade. Alm dele, foram indicados outros seis nomes.
Veja abaixo os nomes j indicados anteriormente:

description.hltext_display: Denuncia Assange amenazas de muerte
description.content:
El fundador de Wikileaks apunta a presuntos miembros de las Fuerzas Armadas de Estados Unidos
MADRID, Espaa.- El fundador de Wikileaks, Julian Assange, replic ayer al vicepresidente estadunidense, Joe Biden, quien lo calific de "terrorista ", elogi el apoyo del presidente de Luiz Igncio Lula da Silva y denunci amenazas de muerte, en entrevista a El Pas.
En su primera entrevista desde que sali de prisin el jueves pasado, Assange reaccion a las declaraciones que hizo Biden el domingo a la cadena NBC en el sentido de que Estados Unidos examina presentar cargos en su contra por terrorismo y cuestion: Quin es terrorista?
En una entrevista en el programa Meet the press de NBC, el vicepresidente de Estados Unidos calific a Assange de "terrorista de alta tecnologa", por la reciente difusin de 250 mil documentos clasificados sobre la poltica diplomtica estadunidense.
Sin embargo, el editor australiano, quien se encuentra en libertad bajo fianza en Reino Unido por una demanda por acoso sexual presentada en Suecia, dijo la madrugada de ayer en una conversacin telefnica con El Pas que difundir la verdad no es un crimen.
"Segn el vicepresidente, la verdad sobre Estados Unidos es terrorismo. Terrorismo definido como emplear la violencia con fines polticos. La administracin de Biden sigue ofendindose con nuestra organizacin y la prensa con un objetivo violento o poltico, as que, quin es el terrorista?", replic.
Biden afirm que su pas considera a Assange un terrorista y revel que su gobierno presentar cargos en su contra por terrorismo y que de acuerdo con esa clasificacin, podra solicitar su extradicin.
De acuerdo con el vicepresidente, El Pentgono cree, y quiere demostrar, que Assange incit al soldado raso Bradley Manning a sustraer la informacin secreta de las redes de El Pentgono para depositarla en los servidores de Wikileaks.
"Si conspir para obtener esos documentos clasificados junto con un miembro del Ejrcito de Estados Unidos, eso es algo fundamentalmente distinto a slo dejarle los documentos a alguien y decir: Eres un periodista, te doy un material clasificado", dijo Biden.
El fundador de Wikileaks tambin elogi al presidente de Brasil por el apoyo que le dio y denunci que tanto l, como sus hijos y su abogado, son amenazados de muerte constantemente e intimidados por presuntos miembros de las Fuerzas Armadas de Estados Unidos.
Assange dijo que el presidente Lula es un caso especial, por su inminente retiro, que ahora le permite ser ms directo de lo que habra sido antes. Ya no tiene que rendir ninguna pleitesa a los Estados Unidos".
Sobre las amenazas de muerte que recibe, el editor australiano revel que se han hecho algo cotidiano y que la mayora de ellas "parecen provenir de miembros de las Fuerzas Armadas de Estados Unidos".
"Las recibo a cada rato. Mi abogado las recibe, mis hijos las reciben", dijo Assange.
Durante su entrevista con el diario espaol, el fundador de Wikileaks tambin hace revelaciones durante su estancia en prisin de das pasado, donde afirma que convivi con presos condenados por delitos sexuales, malos tratos recibidos y el temor de ser asesinado.

description.hltext_display: Liam Gallagher plans Christmas stuffing
description.author: Bangshowbiz
description.content: Liam Gallagher plans to eat "loads" and get drunk at Christmas. "What are the kids after this year? What do you think? Loads of f***ing toys." Much like Liam - who also has a 12-year-old daughter Molly from a fling he had with singer-songwriter Lisa Moorish while he was married to Patsy - Beady Eye guitarist Andy Bell has similar festive rituals planned for this year. Andy said: "Christmas is always the same for me every year - kids, dogs, presents, films, TV, booze . I'm just sat on the sofa with a can of lager in my hand, shouting at people."

description.hltext_display: North Mesquite, Mesquite boys lock up wins in non-district play
description.content:
North Mesquite continued its strong start to the season with a 78-69 victory over Rockwall Heath on Friday. The Stallions have now won six consecutive games to push their record to 11-4 overall on the season.
North Mesquite trailed early but came back to take a 39-36 lead at halftime. The game remained close through the early stages of the second half until the Stallions outscored the Hawks 25-19 in the fourth to finally pull away.
Sidney Gilstrap had 20 points to pace a group of four North Mesquite players in double figures. King Davis scored 13 points, Kendal Copeland had 11 and Darik Walker chipped in with 10.
The Stallions are scheduled to open play in the Avery Air Invitational in Plano on Monday against Carrollton Creekview at 5:15 p.m. The tournament is scheduled to run through Wednesday.
Mesquite posted a pair of wins during the past week to improve to 7-8 on the season.
The Skeeters rolled over Waco on Monday in a 77-51 win. Mesquite was in control at halftime with a 35-26 lead and then put the game away in the third quarter with a 23-9 run.
Alex Cooper scored 12 points to lead a balanced scoring effort. Ty Belt had 11 points and Denzel Jordan added 10 as 11 different players got on the score sheet.
Last Friday, the third quarter was once again kind to Mesquite as it went on to a 60-48 victory over Garland.
Both teams got off to slow starts offensively, combining for just 12 points in the opening quarter. Garland led 28-21 at halftime before the Skeeters exploded for a 29-9 spurt in the third quarter to take a lead they would not relinquish.
Cooper scored a game-high 24 points, with Gary Finley and Eric Reed each adding 10.
Mesquite will also be in the Avery Air Invitational along with North Mesquite starting on Monday. The Skeeters are scheduled to face Richardson at 11 a.m. in the opening round.
Horn dropped to 9-7 on the season with a 64-36 loss to Cedar Hill last Friday. The Jaguars stayed close for one half, trailing 24-21 at intermission.
Cedar Hill then opened a 43-31 lead through three quarters and closed the game with a 21-5 run.
Vincent Hobbs had 10 points for Horn, while Michael King and JaCorey Shepherd each added nine.
The Jaguars are scheduled to face Pearce on Monday in the opening round of the DISD Coca Cola Tournament.

description.hltext_display: EsportesFederer bate Nadal em jogo beneficente na Sua
description.content:
O suo Roger Federer venceu o espanhol Rafael Nadal nesta tera-feira, em jogo beneficente realizado em Zurique, na Sua, que serviu para arrecadar fundos para necessitados na frica. Cerca de 13 mil pessoas marcaram presena no ginsio que abrigou o confronto promovido pela fundao dirigida pelo tenista da casa, que pretende promover o acesso educao e ao esporte e visa melhorar as condies de vida de crianas em pases onde no existem recursos suficientes.
Federer venceu o duelo amistoso por 2 sets a 1, de virada, com parciais de 4/6, 6/3 e 6/3, aos olhos do alemo Sebastian Vettel mais novo campeo mundial de Frmula 1, que foi ao ginsio suo e aplaudiu a vitria do jogador local.
O tenista da Sua, porm, minimizou a importncia esportiva de seu triunfo aps o duelo e agradeceu a presena de Nadal como seu adversrio. "Agradeo muito ao Rafa por ter vindo. Tentamos fazer o melhor em quadra. No estamos acostumados com este tipo de jogo e sempre h um pouco de presso em uma partida assim, mas no nada importante quem venceu. O importante que ajudar minha fundao", afirmou Federer, ainda na quadra do confronto.
A vitria desta tera foi a segunda seguida do segundo colocado do ranking mundial sobre o lder geral, que havia sido superado pelo suo na deciso do ATP Finals, em Londres, no final do ms passado, em Londres.
Nesta quarta-feira, Nadal e Federer voltaro a se enfrentar em novo duelo beneficente, que ser realizado em Madri, s 16 horas (de Braslia), e desta vez reverter fundos fundao que leva o nome do tenista espanhol. A instituio tambm pretende ajudar crianas necessitadas com o dinheiro arrecadado no amistoso.

description.hltext_display: Suspected gas leak kills 2 workers at plant in southern India that makes generic drugs
description.content:
Dr. Reddy's Laboratories , Southern India , HYDERABAD , India
HYDERABAD, India - Police say a suspected gas leak in a drug manufacturing plant in southern India has killed at least two workers.
Police officer Sunder Kumar Das says another four workers were hospitalized early Wednesday in Bolrum. The industrial township is on the outskirts of Hyderabad, the capital of Andhra Pradesh state.
The suspected leak occurred in the plant of Dr. Reddy's Laboratories, which has over 100 generics for sale in emerging markets.
Other details are not immediately available. Police are investigating.

description.hltext_display: Prevalece caos en Europa por intensas nevadas
description.content:
BRUSELAS, Blgica.- Las fuertes nevadas en Europa mantienen cerrado el aeropuerto de Bruselas y han obligado a cancelar o aplazar vuelos en las terminales areas de Reino Unido y Francia, dejando a miles de pasajeros varados a escasos das de la Navidad.
En Blgica, la ola glida ha afectado el funcionamiento del aeropuerto internacional de Bruselas (Zaventem), que ha cancelado todos los vuelos desde la tarde de ayer hasta la medianoche del martes por falta de lquido anticongelante, usado para remover el hielo de las aeronaves.
Las temperaturas extremamente bajas en Blgica a lo largo del ltimo fin de semana han obligado al aeropuerto a utilizar grandes cantidades de lquido anticongelante, al punto que sus reservas se agotaron.
El suministro no ha podido ser restablecido debido a que la nevada ha obligado a las autoridades belgas y francesas a interrumpir el trfico de camiones de gran tonelaje, como los que transportan el producto.
En Reino Unido, el trfico areo fue un caos por tercer da consecutivo, pese a la reapertura de una de las dos pistas del aeropuerto londinense de Heathrow, en el que se registraban numerosas cancelaciones e importantes retrasos.
Heathrow, el aeropuerto de mayor trfico en Europa, advirti en su pgina web que slo operar un programa limitado de llegadas y salidas durante este lunes y que espera ms cancelaciones y retrasos en los prximos das.
El aeropuerto londinense de Gatwick empieza este lunes a recuperar lentamente la normalidad, al igual que el de London City.
Cientos de pasajeros, que comenzara sus vacaciones navideas, pasaron la noche en las terminales areas debido a la anulacin de sus vuelos el domingo, da en que Reino Unido registr la temperatura ms baja en el ltimo siglo, 19 grados bajo cero en Chesham, norte de Londres.
Las dificultades registradas en Heathrow repercutieron en otros aeropuertos europeos como Amsterdam, Estocolmo o Francfort, donde en este ltimo se anularon ms de 300 vuelos la maana de ayer.
Ante el mal tiempo que afecta los aeropuertos de Berln, Munich y Francfort, el ministro alemn de Transportes, Peter Ramsauer, pidi a los estados federales autorizar viajes nocturnos para absorber a los pasajeros de vuelos cancelados.
Por su parte, la Direccin General de la Aviacin Civil (DGAC) de Francia pidi a las compaas areas reducir en 30 por ciento sus vuelos en los aeropuertos Roissy-Charles de Gaulle y Orly debido a las intensas nevadas.

description.hltext_display: EsportesTcnico do Osasco exalta luta, mas admite erros na final
description.content:
O tcnico Luizomar de Moura exaltou o esprito de luta das jogadores do Sollys/Osasco na final do Mundial de Clubes, mas admitiu que o excesso de erros foi determinante para a derrota diante do Fenerbahe, da Turquia, nesta tera-feira, em Doha, no Catar. Nos trs sets da deciso, a equipe brasileira cometeu 20 erros, contra apenas dez das rivais.
"Ns sabamos que era um grande adversrio, uma equipe muito forte e experiente. Acho que no faltou luta. Acabou faltando um pouco mais de pacincia e acho que isso de alguma maneira ser bom para a nossa equipe na Superliga", afirmou o treinador. "O que apareceu muito neste campeonato foi a quantidade de erros e hoje cometemos alguns erros tticos que acabaram comprometendo".
Capit da equipe, Carol tambm atribuiu a derrota s falhas do time. "Tivemos o dobro de erros e em um jogo de 3 a 0 isso faz a diferena. Hoje ns tnhamos as marcaes do time delas e at marcamos bem as jogadas, mas o problema foi que a nossa equipe errou demais. Na hora que equilibrvamos a partida os erros apareciam novamente", analisou.
Apesar do revs, o tcnico Luizomar avaliou como positiva a participao do Osasco no Mundial. "Chegar a uma final de Mundial sempre positivo. O primeiro objetivo estar em todas as finais e terminamos como segundo colocado. Agora passamos a ser conhecido internacionalmente, em um campeonato extremamente organizado e que teve o ginsio lotado nesta final", declarou.
De volta ao Brasil, as jogadoras do Osasco tero folga neste fim de ano antes de retornar s disputas da Superliga, em 2011. Atual campe, a equipe enfrentar o Banana Boat/Praia Clube no dia 12 de janeiro, em Uberlndia, pela sexta rodada.

description.hltext_display: Santa Rita do Pardo - Solenidade marca formatura da Educao Infantil
description.content:
Solenidade de Formatura dos Alunos do EMEI (Escola Municipal de Educao Infantil Antonio Arcanjo dos Santos Junior) ...
Tamanho do texto: A + -
Imprimir- Enviar Materia
Assessoria de Imprensa
Mais Fotos
Solenidade de Formatura dos Alunos do EMEI (Escola Municipal de Educao Infantil Antonio Arcanjo dos Santos Junior), realizada dia 9, no Salo Municipal Benedito Carlos do Nascimento, foi prestigiada por ilustres autoridades do municpio.
Este ano, o evento teve uma inovao, que foi os paraninfos para entrada das autoridades. Os alunos Sofia e Rai conduziram as autoridades at mesa.
Participaram da cerimnia, alunos do Jardim de Infncia III e as professoras Elaine, Simoni e Soeli; os formandos da Pr-Escola, alunos da professora Marinete, Iria, Cristina; as alunas Maria Luiza com a Bblia e aluna Maria Eduarda com os canudos dos formandos. Teve ainda a entrada das Bandeiras.
O Aluno Fabrcio entrou com a Bandeira do nosso Municpio; aluna Ana Beatriz com a Bandeira do Brasil e o aluno Thiago Lomba com a bandeira de Mato Grosso do Sul.
A criana fonte de amor. Amor a este cho. Amor ao Brasil. E para que este Brasil seja alegre, verdadeiro, justo e uma Nao poderosa faz-se necessrio que saibamos semear nos coraes das crianas essa semente especial que o Amor.
Demonstrando o nosso amor pelo Brasil, em seqncia foi entoarmos o Hino Nacional Brasileiro, hino do estado e hino do municpio, Juramentista da Turma de Formandos foi o aluno Matheus Kuboki que fez o juramento juntos com os demais colegas, os alunos Ana Gabriela, Beatriz, Emilly Faustino Jssica, Murilo e Tnia. Vanessa fez um agradecimento a Deus, aos pais, s Professoras, ao Diretor, funcionrios e aos colegas.
Estiveram presentes a Gerente de Educao Dirce Alice Moreno, Diretor Jose Mario Pereira, Secretaria Escolar Maria Rosana da Silva, Coordenadora Pedaggica Eliana Mara Arajo da Silva, Diretora Edna Aparecida de Castro Barbosa. Marcaram presenas tambm as mes e pais dos alunos.
Atualmente, a Escola de Educao Infantil atende alunos da cidade e do campo, sendo a grande maioria da Zona Rural.
A solenidade contou ainda com vrias apresentaes feitas pelos alunos da EMEI (Escola Municipal de Educao Infantil). Houve tambm homenagens e entrega de diplomas.
A Gerente de Educao, Dirce Alice, deus os parabns a todos pelo trabalho realizado no ano de 2010. A educao no municpio est de parabns, isso se deve ao trabalho realizado pelos educadores e servidores, disse, ao agradecer tambm o esforo que os pais dos alunos tm feito para as crianas frenquentem escola. Essas crianas esto conquistando mais um degrau na sua vida escolar, comentou.
A Cerimnia foi encerada com a entrega dos diplomas para os formandos.

Herbert King
description.content:
t Samaritan Inpatient Hospice, Mt. Holly. He was 63.
Born in Guntersville, Ala., Ray resided in Browns Mills and Southampton, N.J., most of his life.
He was a U.S. Army veteran serving during the Vietnam War.
Ray was a good guy that will be dearly missed by his family and friends.
He was the son of the late William and Hazel King; and brother of the late Verva Huda.
He is survived by his loving wife of 40 years, Lois A. King (Medenbach); his daughter and son-in-law, Michelle and Tommy D'Amico of Southampton; three brothers, William King, and Dick and Jim Doran; his sister, Patricia Louth; four grandchildren, Jordan, Breanna, Megan and Nathan; and several nieces and nephews.
A gathering of family and friends to celebrate his life will be held from 4 to 8 p.m. Tuesday, Dec. 28, at his daughter Michelle's home, 16 D'Amico Court, Southampton, N.J.
Interment will be held privately at the convenience of the family.
In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made in Ray's name to the American Cancer Society, 1851 Old Cuthbert Rd., Cherry Hill, NJ 08034. Mathis Funeral Home,

description.hltext_display: Baixada SantistaProtesto: comerciantes se acorrentam em So Vicente
description.content:
Algemados, um casal com o filho sentaram-se em pleno cruzamento das ruas Joo Ramalho e Martim Afonso, em So Vicente, em protesto ao da Secretaria Municipal do Comrcio.
Na ltima segunda-feira, em ao de combate a irregularidades, fiscais da secretaria proibiram que eles continuassem usando as ruas do Centro de So Vicente para vender seus produtos. O casal no possui licena de ambulante para atuar na Cidade.
O problema que eles alegam no ter outra fonte de renda e que esto preocupados com o futuro.
Tudo o que quero um acordo com a Prefeitura. A banquinha que trabalhvamos existia h mais de 20 anos e nunca deu problema, diz Ricardo. Acrescenta que no quer ganhar de mo beijada. Fao questo de trabalhar para conseguir o meu sustento. Mas, nesse momento, preciso de ajuda para poder fazer isso, afirmou Ricardo de Assis Pimentel.
Eles afirmam que no meio desse ano tentaram resolver a pendncia com a Prefeitura, mas que algumas dificuldades apareceram no meio do caminho. Estamos comeando um abaixo-assinado para que possamos resolver a situao, completou Lucinia Quintino.

description.hltext_display: Look for Shares of Hansen Natural to Potentially Pullback after Yesterday's 2.05% Rise (HANS)
description.content:
Hansen Natural (NASDAQ:HANS) traded in a range yesterday that spanned from a low of $53.41 to a high of $54.75. Yesterday, the shares gained 2.05%, which took the trading range above the 3-day high of $53.36 on volume of 1.2 million shares. Often times after large one-day gains, short term traders will seek to take profits and, as such, investors should be cautious.
Shares of Hansen Natural are currently trading above their 50-day moving average (MA) of $51.08 and above their 200-day MA of $44.69. Look for the MA to provide support for a short-term pullback in the shares.
SmarTrend currently has shares of Hansen Natural in an Uptrend and issued the Uptrend alert on August 06, 2010 at $44.12. The stock has risen 19.6% since the Uptrend alert was issued.
SmarTrend expects the share price to pullback toward the $53.36 support level. Afterwards, we expect it to move upward with its peers in the SmarTrend Beverages- Soft Drinks industry.
Keywords: hansen natural trading range stock news

description.hltext_display: Asume Papa responsabilidad por sacerdotes pederastas
description.content:
EL VATICANO.- El Papa Benedicto XVI asumi la responsabilidad por los abusos sexuales contra menores de edad cometidos por sacerdotes catlicos, y revel que la magnitud inimaginable del problema conmocion a toda la Iglesia.
En su tradicional mensaje de fin de ao, dirigido a sus principales colaboradores de la Curia Romana en la Sala Regia del Palacio Apostlico de El Vaticano, pidi aceptar la humillacin provocada por el escndalo y verla como un llamado a la verdad.
Somos conscientes de la particular gravedad de este pecado cometido por sacerdotes y de nuestra correspondiente responsabilidad, estableci.
Apunt que esos actos trastornan el sacramento del sacerdocio porque bajo el manto del sacro hieren profundamente la persona humana en su infancia y le provocan un dao para toda la vida.
Debemos aceptar esta humillacin como una exhortacin a la verdad y una llamada a la renovacin. Slo la verdad salva. Debemos preguntarnos sobre qu podemos hacer para reparar lo ms posible la injusticia ocurrida, inst.
Debemos preguntarnos agreg qu era errado en nuestro anuncio, en nuestro entero modo de configurar el ser cristiano, tanto que una cosa as pudiese ocurrir. Debemos encontrar un nuevo impulso en la fe y en el bien. Debemos ser capaces de penitencia.
Solicit adems esforzarse por hacer todo lo posible para evitar, desde la preparacin al sacerdocio, que los abusos vuelvan a ocurrir.
Agradeci a quienes se empean por ayudar a las vctimas y darles una nueva confianza en la Iglesia, personas que, con gran dedicacin, estn junto a quienes han sufrido dao.
El lder catlico afirm que, si bien la Iglesia reconoce su responsabilidad, no puede callar sobre un contexto que facilit los abusos en el cual existe un mercado de la pornografa infantil que, en cierta manera, es considerado como una cosa normal.
La devastacin psicolgica de los nios, cuyas personas humanas son reducidas a artculo de mercado, es un terrorfico signo de los tiempos, indic.
Segn el Obispo de Roma todo placer se vuelve insuficiente y el exceso de la ebriedad se convierte en una violencia que despedaza enteras regiones.
El mundo, con todas sus nuevas esperanzas y posibilidades est, al mismo tiempo, angustiado por la impresin que el consenso moral se est disolviendo, un consenso sin el cual las estructuras jurdicas y polticas no funcionan, sentenci.

description.hltext_display: Europe travel chaos eases but pain remains
description.author: Michael Roddy
description.content:
LONDON (Reuters) Airline and international train services were limping back towards normal in parts of Europe on Wednesday, but the lingering effects of ice and snow that caused widespread chaos still weighed on schedules.
The disruptions to airlines and high-speed trains in continental Europe, and linking Britain to the continent, created a nightmare before Christmas scenario for tens of thousands of travellers since the weekend, when heavy snow fell.
They also brought calls for legislation to force airports to deal more effectively with snow and other bad weather.
European Union transport chief Siim Kallas said he was considering forcing airports to provide a minimum level of infrastructure support during severe weather. London's Heathrow, the world's busiest international airport, and Frankfurt Airport, the biggest on the continent, which both had severe disruptions earlier in the week, said on their websites that operations were returning to normal.
Heathrow said it had reopened its second runway on Tuesday, offering a ray of hope for thousands of passengers stranded in departure halls, some for days in scenes that British newspapers said resembled refugee camps. "The southern runway at Heathrow is now open. Airlines are currently operating a significantly reduced schedule while they move diverted aircraft and crew back into position," airport operator BAA, owned by Spain's Ferrovial, said on its website.
British Airways said that in line with a directive from BAA, it would operate only a third of its normal flight schedule at Heathrow until 6 a.m. on Thursday. "It will take some time to rebuild an operation of our size and complexity at our hub airport, Heathrow," the airline said on its website. "We ask you not to travel to the airport unless you have a confirmed booking on one of the flights that is operating." "GOOD PROSPECTS" Flights to and from Frankfurt Airport resumed on Tuesday morning after the airport was shut for several hours overnight.
German airline Lufthansa said the situation at Frankfurt "is gradually returning to normal" and that it "sees good prospects for a return to normal flight operations". Eurostar, operator of the high-speed train between London and Brussels and Paris, said it would resume normal check-in service, but asked passengers not to show up until an hour before departure "to avoid congestion and an unnecessary wait". On Tuesday, thousands of people were forced to queue in frigid temperatures for hours around St. Pancras station in north London as every available Eurostar seat was snapped up by travellers bounced from airlines.
Eurostar said nine of its 52 trains would be cancelled on Wednesday but that passengers for those services would be "reallocated onto one of the next available trains". Although the logjam of travellers was starting to ease, many passengers were irate. "This was our holiday of a lifetime," a man at Heathrow who'd been planning to travel with his wife told Sky News. "And it's a nightmare." (Editing by Robert Birsel)

description.hltext_display: Ashley Jensen gets Christmas thrill back
description.author: Bangshowbiz
description.content: Ashley Jensen is excited about Christmas again since becoming a mother. The 'Ugly Betty' star - who has a 14-month-old son Frankie with her husband, English actor Terence Beesley - is looking forward to the big day this year more than she has in years because of her son, even though she accepts he is too young to know exactly what's going on. She said: "He's still too young to fully embrace the joys of the festive season but the fact that he's starting to be aware of the world around him is the perfect excuse to re-embrace those wonderful traditions - like leaving out a mince pie and a glass of whiskey for Santa on Christmas Eve." The 41-year-old star admits the festive season had slightly lost its appeal for her in recent years and is delighted that Frankie's arrival has changed her attitude. She added: "Before Frankie came along, it was all a bit forced. Now I can be all festive again!" However, Ashley admitted it is quite difficult to celebrate Christmas in the stifling heat of Los Angeles, where she and her family's permanent home is. She explained: "It's not easy living in Los Angeles and celebrating Christmas. Being in warm sunshine isn't great for putting oneself in the mood. Going to the shopping mall, where they blow fake snow from a machine every hour on the hour while the PA system plays 'White Christmas' doesn't quite do it for me."

description.hltext_display: Santa Rita do Pardo - Produtores vo agregar valor ao leite com miniusina
description.content:
A prefeita Eledir lanou na manh no dia 10 de dezembro, a miniusina de pasteurizao de leite para os produtores do Assentamento Crrego Dourado.
Tamanho do texto: A + -
Imprimir- Enviar Materia
Assessoria de Imprensa
Mais Fotos
A prefeita Eledir lanou na manh no dia 10 de dezembro, a miniusina de pasteurizao de leite para os produtores do Assentamento Crrego Dourado. A solenidade foi realizada na sede do assentamento, com as presenas das autoridades locais, entre elas a prefeita Eledir Barcelos; representante do setor de obras,Valdeci Alves; vereadores Josu Nogueira Martinez, Vanildo Rodrigues, Jonas Faustino,Tereza de Jesus da Silva Souza; presidente da Associao do Assentamento Crrego Dourado, Agnaldo dos Santos Nascimento; presidente da associao do Assentamento Santa Rita, Jos Milton de Souza, e os produtores do assentamento.
Visando trazer sustentabilidade para os agricultores familiares, a prefeita Eledir Barcelos entregou a obra da miniusina de pasteurizao de leite, que tem rea construda de 36,30 m.
Os recursos so oriundos do Ministrio de Desenvolvimento Agrrio, atravs da Secretaria de Desenvolvimento Territorial (SDT), com apoio do Projeto de Infraestrutura e Servio em Territrios Rurais, e contrapartida da Prefeitura Municipal de Santa Rita do Pardo.
A miniusina de pasteurizao representa o fechamento com chave de ouro dos trabalhos do Governo Municipal neste ano. Este projeto foi viabilizado com muito trabalho e ir agregar valor ao leite produzido neste assentamento, com a oportunidade de ser vendido diretamente ao consumidor, dentro dos padres de sade exigidos pelo Ministrio, melhorando a qualidade de vida dos produtores, disse a prefeita.
Os vereadores do Legislativo Municipal afirmaram que iro duplicar a produtividade e o valor agregado para os produtores de leite com os investimentos na miniusina de pasteurizao. Esse dia ficar na histria. Precisamos pensar em melhorar cada dia mais, agradecemos a prefeita por mais esta conquista, declararam os vereadores de forma unnime.
O Presidente Agnaldo do S. Nascimento falou da satisfao em ver a evoluo do Assentamento Crrego Dourado, que foi implantado graas luta dos produtores. Tudo que produzido aqui gera emprego e renda para nossa cidade. Queremos que todos cresam e alcancem qualidade de vida cada vez melhor, destacou.
A prefeita Eledir Barcelos afirmou que produzir leite um grande desafio, por conta do preo que pago ao produtor, sendo a miniusina uma oportunidade para agregar valor ao produto. Quando mais produzirem, melhor ser para vocs, produtores, que devem se preparar para ampliar a produo e gerar mais renda para as famlias, observou.
Eledir agradeceu o apoio recebido ao longo dos anos, pelo trabalho e dedicao pela terra, ajudando no processo de desenvolvimento e crescimento da cidade. Desejo a vocs um 2011 com muito trabalho e muito sucesso, finalizou.

description.hltext_display: Obama secures votes for arms pact
description.content:
The pact would cap nuclear warheads for both former Cold War foes and restart on-site weapons inspections.
Eleven Republicans joined Democrats in a 67-28 proxy vote to wind up the debate and hold a final tally today. They broke ranks with the Senates top two Republicans and were poised to give Obama a bipartisan win on his top foreign policy priority. We know when weve been beaten, Republican Sen. Orrin Hatch of Utah told reporters.
Ratification requires two-thirds of those voting in the Senate and Democrats need at least nine Republicans to overcome the opposition of Minority Leader Mitch McConnell of Kentucky and Jon Kyl of Arizona, the partys point man on the treaty.
The Obama administration has made arms control negotiations the centerpiece of resetting its relationship with Russia, and the treaty was critical to any rapprochement.
Momentum for the accord accelerated earlier in the day Tuesday ? the seventh day of debate ? when Lamar Alexander of Tennessee, the No. 3 Republican in the Senate, announced his support.
The treaty will leave the United States with enough nuclear warheads to blow any attacker to kingdom come, Alexander said on the Senate floor. Im convinced that Americans are safer and more secure with the new START treaty than without it. Five other Republican senators ? Lisa Murkowski of Alaska, Johnny Isakson of Georgia, Bob Corker of Tennessee, Robert Bennett of Utah and Thad Cochran of Mississippi ? said they would back the pact.
Obama has insisted the treaty is a national security imperative that will improve cooperation with Russia, an argument loudly echoed by the nations military and foreign policy leaders, former Presidents George H.W. Bush and Bill Clinton, and six former Republican secretaries of state.
Conservative foes of the accord ? among them possible GOP presidential candidates Mitt Romney, Sarah Palin, Newt Gingrich and Tim Pawlenty ? argue the treaty would restrict U.S. options on a missile-defense system to protect America and its allies and lacks sufficient procedures to verify Russias adherence. The administration did not negotiate a good treaty. They went into the negotiations it seems to me with the attitude with the Russians just like the guy who goes into the car dealership and says, Im not leaving here until I buy a car, Kyl said. All 57 members of the Democratic caucus are expected to back the treaty; Sen. Ron Wyden, D-Ore., underwent cancer surgery Monday and is likely to miss the vote.
Republicans who have previously announced they will vote for the treaty are Richard Lugar of Indiana, Olympia Snowe and Susan Collins of Maine, Scott Brown of Massachusetts and George Voinovich of Ohio.

description.hltext_display: EsportesCelso Roth renova contrato com o Inter por mais um ano
description.content:
O Internacional anunciou nesta tera-feira a renovao do contrato do tcnico Celso Roth at o final de 2011. O clube informou que o acordo foi firmado aps uma reunio realizada em Porto Alegre entre o treinador e a direo colorada.
Com o anncio, Roth acabou tendo valorizada a conquista da Copa Libertadores da Amrica deste ano, mesmo depois de ter visto o seu time protagonizar um fiasco histrico na semifinal do Mundial de Clubes da Fifa, no qual a equipe gacha foi eliminada pelo africano Mazembe ao ser derrotada por 2 a 0, em Abu Dabi, nos Emirados rabes.
A renovao do contrato foi anunciada pelo Internacional um dia depois de o time desembarcar na capital gacha, aps deixar Abu Dabi com a conquista da terceira colocao do Mundial de Clubes. Os valores do novo acordo no foram divulgados pelas partes.

description.hltext_display: Microsoft to announce ARM ready Windows OS at CES
description.content:
In a blow to former BFF Intel, Microsoft Corp. is apparently preparing to release an ARM supported version of its ubiquitous Windows software for PCs and tablets, according to Bloomberg news sources.
The anonymous sources reckon the announcement will be made in two weeks at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Vegas, and that the new trimmed down Windows operating system has been developed especially for low power, battery operated devices like tablets and smartphones.
If true, the move is not only problematic for Intel, which loses its main advantage versus the ARM chip which previously could not support Windows, but also for Googles Android and/or Chrome which could lose out to a lightweight version of the popular Microsoft PC software.
It would also give Microsoft a chance to take the mobile market by storm, something it was previously unable to do with its desktop OS, seeing as most mobile chips by Qualcomm, Texas Instruments, Samsung, NVIDIA, Marvell etc are all ARM based.
This will be an interesting one to watch.

description.hltext_display: Why Collezione C2 Philippine Map T Shirts and Polo Shirts are Popular
description.content: No one should be surprised over the immense popularity of Collezione C2 Philippine map t shirts and polo shirts in the Philippines and all over the world right from the moment they were released in the country. That the attractiveness of Collezione C2 t shirts and polo shirts are not merely contingent on their novelty appeal is proven by the fact that the acclaim has not ceased many, many months after that launch. It has been established that these shirts are destined to stay in the Philippine fashion scene for good because Filipinos from all sectors of society have given their full acceptance and support. Even non-Filipinos have also done so. The popularity comes easily because these shirts are both classic and new with a twist. To meet the great demand for these Collezione C2 Philippine map t shirts and polo shirts not only locally but also from all over the globe, the official Collezione C2 online store has been established from the Philippines.The Collezione C2 t shirts may already be made attractive by literally displaying the map of the Philippine islands but they have an even more powerful symbolic appeal. To most Filipinos, the map represents national identity and pride of country. Such sentiments are readily understood by people of other nationalities and they are, therefore, quick to show their solidarity with Filipinos. This is the reason why the official Collezione C2 online store is able to sell the t shirts not only to Filipinos but to people of many other countries of the world, as well. The shirts from the Philippines can be bought with just an internet connection and a credit card or a PayPal account.It is no secret that Filipinos are emotional and sentimental, not bothering to hide what they feel, especially when it comes to love for the Motherland. In celebrating Philippine Independence Day, Filipinos love to display the Philippine flag from public and private buildings, homes and even vehicles. Pins of the national flag are worn by men and women on their clothes.What better day is there to wear the Collezione C2 Pilipinas map t shirts and polo shirts but Philippine Independence Day? Aside from that one special day, though, Filipinos can now literally wear their patriotic hearts not just on their sleeves by wearing these symbolic shirts any day of the year or even every day of the year if they want to, in the Philippines or in any other country.The Collezione C2 Philippine Map t shirts are indeed widely popular. They comprise just one part of the entire Collezione C2 line up, though, which also carries other garments like shorts, skirts, tops and dresses likewise designed by Creative Director Rhett Eala. The common thread that runs through the line is consistency in design aesthetics and high production quality. For the moment, the other garments are not being offered for sale along with the t shirts at the official Collezione C2 online store from the Philippines. Interested prospective buyers should check the website every now and then to be able to get alerts.

description.hltext_display: Capturan a miembros de crtel mexicano en Guatemala
description.content:
GUATEMALA, Guatemala.- Las fuerzas de seguridad capturaron a cuatro supuestos miembros del crtel mexicano de Los Zetas en el departamento de Alta Verapaz, en el norte de Guatemala, que est bajo un Estado de sitio, informaron ayer fuentes oficiales.
El gobierno preside lvaro Colom decret el domingo el Estado de sitio en esa regin para expulsar a las clulas del crtel Los Zetas que han asentado su principal base de operaciones en esa zona del pas.
La medida, que persigue "devolver la paz" a los habitantes, durar 30 das, durante los cuales se realizarn operativos y vigilancia en toda la regin.
La estatal Agencia Guatemalteca de Noticias (AGN) inform que este lunes fueron capturados cuatro guatemaltecos presuntos integrantes del grupo Los Zetas que viajaban en un vehculo en el kilmetro 206 que conduce hacia la ciudad de Cobn (Alta Verapaz).
Los detenidos fueron identificados por la agencia oficial como Ramiro Reyes Ramos, Rigoberto Ixpata Vsquez, Hctor Joel Lpez Cuquej y Pedro Agripino Esteban Prez, todos originarios de Alta Verapaz.
En el vehculo en el que se transportaban los supuestos narcotraficantes, las fuerzas de seguridad se incautaron de cuatro escopetas calibre 12 milmetros, tres pistolas 9 milmetros, cuatro celulares, 162 cartuchos para escopeta y 22 cartuchos para fusil de asalto AK-47, entre otros.

description.hltext_display: Baixada SantistaLiminar suspende proibio de sacolas plsticas no comrcio vicentino
description.content:
A lei que probe a distribuio de sacolas plsticas no comrcio vicentino est suspensa. O Sindicato da Indstria de Material Plstico do Estado de So Paulo conseguiu uma liminar que suspendeu a medida que entraria em vigor a partir de janeiro. A deciso foi do desembargador Samuel Jnior, que julgou a Lei 2.438-A inconstitucional embora o texto do documento informe que o relator entende ser de competncia do Poder Pblico tratar de questes ambientais.
O que ns entendemos que ele aprova a lei e entende que nossa competncia legislar sobre causas ambientais. Mas, ao mesmo tempo, julga no ter havido prazo suficiente para os estabelecimentos se adequarem, analisa Gouva.
Em virtude das festas de final do ano, certo que a medida no entrar mais em vigor no comeo de 2011. Mas esse atraso no preocupa o autor da lei, Pedro Gouva.
O sentimento de otimismo. Vamos trabalhar para derrubar essa liminar e, na sequncia, voltarmos as foras para a proibio das sacolas plsticas em So Vicente, garante. Se o problema for prazo, podemos dar um novo tempo de adequao. Mas no podemos retroceder nessa conquista ambiental.
Leia a matria completa na edio desta quarta-feira, em A Tribuna.

description.hltext_display: India tests short-range nuclear-capable missile from eastern state of...
description.content:
BHUBANESHWAR, India - India on Wednesday successfully tested a short-range, nuclear-capable missile with a range of 220 miles (350 kilometres), an official said.
The army twice fired the surface-to-surface missile Prithvi II from a range in Chandipur in the eastern state of Orissa, said S.P. Dash, a senior official at the range. "The test was successful," Dash told The Associated Press.
The missile, which mainly would target military installations, can carry a warhead weighing up to 1,100 pounds (500 kilograms), Dash said.
It already has been tested more than a half-dozen times. However, a test of the same missile three months ago failed due to technical problems.
India and longtime rival Pakistan routinely test-fire missiles, and usually notify each other ahead of the launches.
New Delhi has said it developed its current crop of missiles including the short-range Prithvi, the anti-tank Nag and the supersonic BrahMos as a deterrent against neighbours China and Pakistan.
India's Agni-II missile, with a range of up to 1,250 miles (2,000 kilometres), can put areas of southern China within striking distance. And the Agni-III, successfully tested last year, can carry nuclear warheads across much of Asia and the Middle East.

description.hltext_display: Mary Louise Reeves
description.content:
t her home in Mount Laurel, surrounded by her immediate family. She was 79.
She was the daughter of Edward W. Jennings and Elinor Jones Jennings, both of Haddonfield.
Born and raised in Haddonfield, Marylou still met with her early school friends for lunch. Graduating from Haddonfield High School, she married her high school sweetheart, Horace Reeves, having shared the stage with him in a high school senior play.
She was educated at New Jersey College for Women, (now Douglass College at Rutgers), with a Bachelor of Science degree in Home Economics.
Marylou taught first in Boyertown, Pa., and then joined the first teaching staff at the new Lenape High School as a home economics teacher. She introduced such innovations as cooking classes for boys.
She later graduated with a Master of Arts degree in School Administration from Rutgers, New Brunswick, and later with a Bachelor of Arts degree in Art from Rutgers Camden.
After raising her children, she acquired a certification in special education, and worked for Camp Fire Girls and Boys in Trenton, as a fundraiser and educator. There she developed a special sitters program for educating young persons to babysit special-needs children, providing respite for parents and caregivers.
Marylou was a founder and past president of the "Rotary Anns" organization of the Willingboro Rotary Club. She was a Paul Harris Fellow of Rotary International, which supports the international charitable programs of Rotary.
Marylou was a founding board member of the Willingboro International Festival, a Rotary sponsored event, to support international understanding and cooperation. She was past president and active member of the Willingboro Art Alliance, an educational organization, which sponsored art classes, shows, exhibits and an art gallery. She most recently scheduled speakers and demonstrators at the monthly meetings. Marylou also was a member of the Burlington County Art Guild and was active on the Foundation Boards of both the Burlington County Memorial Hospital and Burlington County College, representing the art community.
Her strength was in fundraising, and she was a major benefit to every organization to which she belonged. She used her extensive network of friends and contacts to support causes important to her. Marylou was an active member and past president of the Burlington County Chamber of Commerce, working closely with her dear friend, Millie Gama.
Her creativity was her passion, concentrating in the later years on experimental water colors. She exhibited in local and regional art shows, and her work can be found in many private collections, and was awarded many prizes.
Marylou is survived by her husband of 56 years, Horace "Hal" Reeves; son, Philip Reeves, and daughter-in-law, Nancy Zeppa of Burlington; daughter, Jennifer Zmirich of Jupiter, Fla; grandson, Zander; nephew, Andrew Indriso and his wife, Fran, of Voorhees; niece, Debra Gimello and her husband, Steve, of Sicklerville; niece Nancy Indriso and partner, Colleen, of Asheville, N.C.; and niece, Cindy Indriso of Barcelona, Spain.
Marylou's memorial celebration service will be held at 2 p.m. Wednesday, Dec. 29, at Page Funeral Home, 302 E. Union St., Burlington. A reception will follow. The family invites friends to visit at the funeral home from 1 to 2 p.m. Interment will be held privately.
In lieu of flowers, a contribution may be made for a perpetual memorial art prize in Marylou's name to the Willingboro Art Alliance, P.O. Box 2275, Willingboro, NJ 08046. Page Funeral Home,

description.hltext_display: Fitch upgrades Uzbek banks ratings
description.content:
Uzbekistan, Tashkent, Dec.22 / Trend, D.Azizov /
Fitch Ratings has upgraded Uzbekistan-based Microcreditbank's (MCB) Long-term foreign-currency Issuer Default Rating (IDR) to 'B' from ' B-', the agency's report said.
At the same time, the agency affirmed Asaka Bank's, Uzpromstroybank's (UPSB) and Agrobank's (AB) Long-term foreign currency IDRs at 'B'. The Long-term IDRs of all four banks carry Stable Outlooks.
The IDRs of all four banks reflect Fitch's view that there is likely to be a high propensity for the Uzbek authorities to provide assistance should the banks require it. This view is based on the close integration of the banks with the state, which is reflected in the direct and indirect control of majority stakes in the banks by the authorities, significant volumes of state-directed and policy lending, and the high proportion of funding provided by state agencies or state-controlled companies, the report said.
At the same time, the potential for such support is constrained by Uzbekistan's sovereign credit profile. The future direction of the banks' IDRs is likely to depend on the sovereign credit profile and the degree of integration with, and potential support from, the Uzbek authorities, Fitch analysts believe.
The Individual ratings of the banks reflect their narrow franchises and modest profitability, resulting from their policy functions. In addition, the challenging operating environment and actual or potential asset quality weaknesses could put pressure on capital ratios. At the same time, the ratings reflect the solid liquidity cushion maintained by the banks and very limited refinancing risks. The banks also benefit from support made available by the Uzbek authorities to many of the banks' borrowers, in particular those in the public sector.
Upside potential for the Individual ratings of all four banks is currently limited given the structure of the Uzbek economy and the policy roles of the banks. However, their stand-alone credit profiles could benefit from continued positive economic growth in Uzbekistan, an increase in capital adequacy ratios (less relevant for MCB, which currently already has a strong capital position) and greater franchise diversification.
Asaka's reported volume of problem loans (including 90 days overdue, restructured and under litigation) remained a significant 12.6% of the total portfolio at end-9M10, although in Fitch's view the level of asset quality problems may be higher.
The bank has increased its non-core assets (including foreclosed property and investments in troubled entities) to 106 billion soums (28% of equity at end-9M10) and it plans to invest at least additional 20 billion soums in preparation for their sale. The statutory capital adequacy ratio, although solid (19.5% at end-9M10), was compromised by modest loan impairment reserves (3.6% of the portfolio at end-9M10) and the non-core assets.
As a result of the first half-year of 2010, Asaka was the second-largest bank in Uzbekistan, holding about 12% of sector assets. The bank was initially set up to service the needs of the automobile sector; however, later it became a universal bank, providing services to various sectors of the Uzbek economy.
AB's credit profile is dominated by the single-sector concentration in its loan portfolio, with loans to agricultural companies comprising a large majority of the portfolio. Capitalisation is moderate and, thus, the bank had limited cushion to absorb loan losses. At the same time, loan impairment levels have been manageable to date.
As of the first half-year of 2010, AB was the third-largest bank in the country, with about 11% of sector assets. AB plays a central role in delivering agricultural credit, mainly to cotton and grain producers, in Uzbekistan.
Uzpromstroybank's loan portfolio loan portfolio is highly concentrated, with the top 20 borrowers accounting for 4.6x equity at end-9M10, although almost a half of these were covered by sovereign guarantees. The quality of the state-guaranteed portfolio (around 25% of gross loan book) remained poor, while the reported performance of non-guaranteed loans appeared manageable at end-9M10, particularly after some of Uzpromstroybank's long-standing clients repaid the loans restructured in 2009. However, UPSB resumed lending to these customers and at end-9M10 they still remained among the bank's largest borrowers. Uzpromstroybank's loss absorption capacity was very limited as reflected by its low impairment reserves (2.1% of the portfolio) and tight statutory capital adequacy ratio (11.5% at end-9M10). An equity injection of 30 billion soums from the state is tentatively scheduled for 2011.
Uzpromstroybank is focused on servicing large corporate clients, particularly from the oil, gas, power and chemical industries. At end-H110 UPSB was the fourth largest bank by assets in Uzbekistan, with a market share of about 10%.
MCB's loan book is diversified by name, although the single industry concentration was substantial at end-Q310, with direct exposures to the agricultural sector accounting for 60% of the loan portfolio, while some borrowers from other industries were also connected with the agricultural business. The bank's credit profile has been supported by very limited credit losses reported to date and the significant capital cushion (capital adequacy ratio was 32% at end-9M10, even despite the seasonal peak in lending).
As a result of January-June 2010, MCB was the eighth-largest bank in the country, with about 2.9% of sector assets. The main objective of the bank is to promote the development of microfinance services, particularly in the rural areas of Uzbekistan.
Do you have any feedback? Contact our journalist at capital@trend.az

description.hltext_display: An apologyand a call for ablutions
description.content:
Author: Tariq Al-Homayed
Here we have an Arab paradox: Watban al-Tikriti, half brother of former Iraqi President Saddam Hussein, stands apologizing to the Iraqi people for the abuses and violations committed by the Baath Party against Iraq and its people. Meanwhile the Sudanese President stands in front of citizens protesting against the brutal whipping of a Sudanese woman, and demands that they perform ablutions, pray to God, and return to Islam!
Ironically, Watban stood apologizing for the actions of the Baath Party after Baghdad had already been destroyed, thus rendering his apology useless, as the country has now entered a dark tunnel of terror, fear, and sectarianism. Iraq is under hidden Iranian occupation. While the Americans have announced the beginning of their withdrawal from Baghdad, we do not know when the Iranian withdrawal will be announced. Meanwhile, as Sudan prepares for separation, or division, its President stands in front of his citizens and says: If south Sudan secedes, we will change the constitution and then there will be no time to speak of diversity of culture and ethnicity. Shariaa and Islam will be the main source for the constitution. However, he went on to say Some people are talking about the girl who was lashed in accordance with Gods punishment. Those who say they are ashamed by this should perform ablutions, pray to God, and return to Islam.
Sudan is on the verge of separation, and the government continues to sell its citizens the same slogan it championed when it first seized power, namely that Islam is the solution, and one can do nothing but repeat the following verse of poetry:
O you who worships in the vicinity of the Two Holy Mosques! If you but see us, you will realize that you are only jesting in worship.
The country is under the threat of sanctions, international prosecutions, and division is just around the corner. The government is busy justifying its brutal whipping of a woman, and has promised its citizens that Islamic Shariaa law will be enforce more strictly if the south secedes from the north. It is like someone threatening to gouge out their left eye, once their right eye has already been gouged out!
My intention here is not to object to the application of Shariaa law, but to say that Sudan today is not suffering from moral decay, or the spread of vice. Rather, it is suffering from widespread unemployment, a national brain drain, and a decline in its production capacity. It is also suffering from international isolation and internal fragmentation. Sudan to this day is still flying on the wings of misguided slogans. Sudan is suffering from internal conflicts caused by wars and ill judged policies, not a lack of religious commitment. Justice is the foundation of governance, and the value of a human being, his blood and his dignity, surpasses all else, regardless of its value; for wouldn't the end of the world by easier on God than the [shedding] of the blood of a believer?
It is a puzzling matter indeed, and it burns at ones conscience. Will we wait every thirty years for someone to stand up and apologize, after it is too late? Today we see Hassan al-Turabi speaking in the name of human rights, yet he is the godfather of Sudans present destruction. What if Nimeiri also returned to stand and apologize for what he did in Sudan, when he applied Islamic Shariaa law in the final years of his rule, which was practically akin to lashing the entire country!
This story cannot be likened to any other, but I will say this: Why do the Arabs not benefit from history in order not to make the same mistakes? This is what really puzzles us, for unfortunately all of our mistakes are similar and repeated; from Lebanon to Iraq to Yemen to Sudan, and also including some of the Gulf States as well!

description.hltext_display: Let Christmas classics spur spirit for rest of year
description.content:
'Marley was dead: to begin with. There is no doubt whatever about that," pronounces the opening line of Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol.
"This must be distinctly understood or nothing wonderful can come from the story I'm about to relate," follows the line in the 1951 screen adaptation with Alastair Sim as the miserly curmudgeon Ebenezer Scrooge, who remarkably transforms his character -- in one night.
Each year at this time we are exposed to these tales of renaissance -- symbolic of the birth of the child for which the holiday is named.
Whether it is Scrooge becoming the "best friend the old city ever had" or Jimmy Stewart's George Bailey in It's A Wonderful Life, getting a second chance while helping an angel earn his wings, the Christmas season brings with it hope and promise anew.
The reason these stories resonate -- they can be read, listened to, or watched over and over again -- is that they inspire spirit in many of us. Sadly, one that can remain dormant for 300-plus days of the year otherwise.
These classic works challenge the human spirit and demonstrate our ability to trump our demons; to know that we have loved ones and support networks to help us triumph.
Dickens and filmmaker Frank Capra knew this.
Many of us might not require wholesale or whirlwind changes in our lives as George and Ebenezer did. But the fact they could endure buoys our inner spirit and strength at a time of the year when the welfare of our fellow human beings and community should be our main concern.
So this holiday season, with just a handful of days until the big day, ask yourself what you would do if the spirits or angels visited you with another chance.
Perhaps it's spending more time with family, less time working, cutting down on excesses, doing more volunteer work, exercising more regularly, or simply dedicating oneself to random acts of kindness on a daily basis.
This was certainly the intent of Dickens, who has his Ghost of Christmas Present remind us that the spirit of the child lives not just one day of the year but all 365. We all would do well to remember this throughout the year, and not just in the holiday season.
As Tiny Tim would say, God Bless Us, Every One.

description.hltext_display: Plastic Packaging Technologies purchased by Mid Oaks Investments
description.author: Admin
description.content:
Tags: Plastic Packaging Technologies
Plastic Packaging Technologies, LLC (PPT), a leading manufacturer of flexible packaging, has been purchased by privately-held Mid Oaks Investments LLC, Buffalo Grove, IL for an undisclosed amount.
Mid Oaks has enjoyed a successful 20-year investment track record in the food packaging industry. As a leading, vertically-integrated manufacturer of flexible packaging products for the food, pet food, specialty consumer and health care industries, PPT is an ideal addition to our portfolio, said Wayne Kocourek, chairman and chief executive officer (CEO), Mid Oaks.
PPTs current management team, led by David Staker, president and CEO and Dan Staker, executive vice president, will continue leading the business under Mid Oaks ownership.
PPT prides itself on providing innovative, high quality products using the best technology available. With Mid Oaks as our new owners, we will have additional resources at our disposal to help PPT grow to the next level, said Staker.
PPT also is known for its superior printed and laminated substrates which are then converted into flexible packaging pouches with strong shelf presence. The company goes a step further by working with brand owners and private label customers to insure the packages also have the desired functionality.
Its not enough just to produce an attractively-printed stand up pouch. You have to work with the customer to make sure you add the right functionalitysliders, spouts, tear-off scoring, etc.which will support product growth and attract repeat purchases, Staker said.
The companys manufacturing capabilities include printing, solventless adhesive lamination, high-speed slitting, pouch making and converting.PPT employs approximately 200 people and operates state-of-the-art equipment in its Kansas City, Kansas and Columbus, Ohio production facilities totaling 175,000 sq. ft. of manufacturing space.
PPT was previously owned by Stonehenge Partners, Inc. and Tech Investments, LLC. The company was advised on the sale by Chicago-based investment bank, Blaige & Company.
About Mid Oaks Investments LLC
Founded in 1986, Mid Oaks, Buffalo Grove, IL, is a private firm whose principals have substantial experience in financial, operating and general management. The company invests its own capital and focuses on acquiring equity positions in established businesses with strong growth potential. For more information: www.midoaks.com.
About Plastic Packaging Technologies LLC
The company is a vertically integrated manufacturer of flexible packaging products for the food, pet food, specialty consumer and health care industries. PPTs products include a full line of converted pouches, bags and film roll stock. The companys value-added manufacturing capabilities include flexographic printing, solventless adhesive lamination, high-speed slitting, pouch making and converting.Its two manufacturing facilities (Kansas City, Kansas and Columbus, Ohio) have both earned a superior rating from AIB International and its Kansas City facility has achieved a Safe Quality Food 2000 Code Level 2 certification. For more information: www.plaspack.com.

Ozzy Osbourne makes generous donation to homeless man
description.author: Bangshowbiz
description.content:
Ozzy Osbourne gave a homeless person $100. The veteran rocker sympathised with the mystery man in Toronto after he told him he was a fan and explained he had been a struggling rock musician until falling on hard times.
Generous Ozzy listened to the story before handing over a bank note, which was gratefully accepted by the man, who then asked the star for an autograph.
According to National Enquirer magazine, the singer then took back the $100 note, signed it and handed it back to his fan, saying: "Maybe now it's worth more than a 100 bucks". This is not the first time Ozzy has displayed generosity to those less fortunate.
Earlier this year, the rocker - who has an estimated joint wealth of $170 million with his TV star wife Sharon - gave a homeless man his $4,500 gold necklace and told him to "pray" for a better future when he met him on the streets of Los Angeles.
A source said at the time: "The guy asked Ozzy for some change. After searching his pockets Ozzy realised he didn't have any so handed him his $4,500 gold necklace instead. "He took the gold crucifix from around his neck and gave it to the man telling him to pray with it. The man could not thank Ozzy enough."

description.hltext_display: South, West census gains favor GOP
description.content:
Eight states will gain congressional districts, including five that backed Sen. John McCain, R-Ariz., for president two years ago. The big winner was Texas, a state that routinely backs Republicans for president. Its population has swelled by about 21 percent since 2000 and as a result will add four House seats.
The gains come at the expense of some states whose growth has been stunted by the decline of manufacturing. Many of them have been historically Democratic; of the 10 states losing seats, eight backed President Obama in the 2008 presidential election. New York and Ohio took the biggest hits, losing two congressional seats each.
Much of the population spike in states that gained congressional districts, such as Texas and Arizona, is because of an influx of Hispanics, who tend to vote Democratic. But it is viewed as a net benefit for Republicans because the growth occurred in GOP-leaning states, and because so many state legislatures shifted to Republican control in November. In most states, it is the legislature that is in charge of the politically charged job of redrawing congressional boundaries.
The changes were announced as part of the first release of 2010 census data, which found that the nation had 308,745,538 residents on April 1, 2010, up about 9.7 percent from 2000. It is the slowest rate of growth since the 1930s, census officials said Tuesday.
The numbers demonstrated a continuation of a long-standing trend that has seen the nations population center shift away from the Northeast and Midwest and into the South and West. Nevada was the fastest-growing state, having swelled by about 35 percent since 2000. On the other end of the spectrum, Michigan saw a population decline of 0.6 percent.
The Census Bureau is required under the Constitution to reapportion House seats every 10 years to ensure that all 435 congressional districts have roughly the same population. Under the new arrangement, the average population of a congressional district will be 710,767, compared with 646,942 in 2000.
The changes have implications for presidential elections because House seats determine the number of votes that each state has in the Electoral College.
On Monday, White House spokesman Robert Gibbs played down any effect the change might have on Obamas re-election prospects, noting that the census simply accounts for population shifts and does not dramatically change the political landscape. I dont think that shifting some seats from one area of the country to another necessarily marks a concern that you cant make a politically potent argument in those new places. Texas gained the most seats, moving from 32 to 36. Florida was the only other state to gain multiple seats, adding two and bringing it to 27 seats.
Six other states gained a single seat: Arizona, Georgia, Nevada, South Carolina, Utah and Washington.
New York and Ohio each lost two seats. Eight other states lost a single seat: Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Michigan, Missouri, New Jersey and Pennsylvania.
Republicans will control the redistricting process in eight of the states experiencing changes, while Democrats will control it in two.

description.hltext_display: BrasilExtradio de Battisti fica para depois do Natal
description.content:
O presidente Luiz Incio Lula da Silva deixou para depois do Natal a deciso sobre a extradio ou no do ativista poltico italiano Cesare Battisti. A informao foi dada pelo chefe de gabinete do presidente, Gilberto Carvalho.
Na tarde desta tera-feira, Lula recebeu do advogado-geral da Unio, Lus Incio Lucena Adams, o parecer do rgo sobre o caso. Mas pediu que alguns aspectos jurdicos sejam apresentados de forma mais clara, Tem alguns aspectos que ele precisa ter mais segurana, para evitar desdobramentos, disse Carvalho, aps encontro com o presidente, no Palcio da Alvorada.
De acordo com o chefe de gabinete, Lula no pretende deixar a deciso para a presidente Dilma Rousseff. Ele quer tomar a deciso, afirmou Carvalho.
Em novembro de 2009, o Supremo Tribunal Federal (STF) autorizou a extradio de Battisti, porm definiu que a deciso final cabe ao presidente da Repblica. Battisti foi condenado priso perptua na Itlia pelo assassinato de quatro pessoas na dcada de 1970.

description.hltext_display: Don't let the giving spirit fade with end of holidays
description.content:
It's a shame, really, that Christmas couldn't be every day.
Not for the presents or the turkey and stuffing, and certainly not for the giant flakes of falling snow we secretly wish for on Christmas Eve. No, it's a shame Christmas isn't every day because the holiday season is a wonderful reminder of how good people inherently are.
For 11 months of the year, we tend to hear more about the bad things people do. Then, come December, as if sprinkled with some sort of Christmas magic, people are a little nicer, walk with a little more bounce in their stride, and respond to the call when those less fortunate need assistance.
Salvation Army kettle campaigns fire up across the country, food banks appeal to the public for assistance, toy drives aim to give every child a Christmas, food hamper programs overflow with volunteers, and the list goes on.
The charitable nature that Canadians demonstrate each year over the holidays is enough to warm even the coldest of hearts. It is a trait that has solidified this country's reputation the world over;
simply put, Canadians respond to those in need, in distress, in crisis.
A Fraser Institute report released Monday finds that Manitoba is the most generous province when it comes to giving, followed by Ontario and Prince Edward Island, which tied for second.
In terms of the average dollar value of charitable donations, Alberta led the country with an average donation of $2,274, with BC ($1,820), Ontario ($1,772) and Manitoba ($1,620) rounding out the top four.
Like the young mother in Calgary who returned a lost wallet with $280 still inside, or the two businesses in Woodstock, Ont., who gave $25,000 to the local Salvation Army to help ensure families and children would receive a Christmas this year, Canadians give what they can and do what they can.
As the last store closes this Christmas Eve, remember that the needs of those less fortunate don't go away once the holidays are over. The need remains just as great, and it is important for all of us to keep the spirit of Christmas in our hearts and our minds all year long

description.hltext_display: CorinthiansAndrs descarta reforos em 2010 e insinua que Roma deve a Adriano
description.content:
Nem Adriano, nem ningum. Segundo o presidente Andrs Sanches, o Corinthians no vai anunciar mais nenhum reforo at o fim de 2010. Parou mesmo no zagueiro Wallace, do Vitria. Em entrevista Rdio Globo nesta tera-feira, o mandatrio alvinegro afirmou que novidades devem ser anunciadas em janeiro, que o Roma tem dvida com o Imperador e tambm das prioridades para 2011.
"Vamos ver se na primeira semana de janeiro ns anunciamos alguma coisa. At o fim do ano eu acho muito difcil. Os jogadores que estamos negociando esto todos sob contrato. E o que est mais perto o Marcinho, mas precisa da liberao do clube l. No est fcil", comentou o presidente corintiano.
Sobre a negociao com o Imperador, Andrs Sanches voltou a negar. Disse, como sempre, que nunca negociou com o atacante, com o Roma ou com o empresrio de Adriano, Gilmar Rinaldi. E mais: voltou a jogar a responsabilidade em Ronaldo por conta da especulao criada em torno do atacante.
"Se o Ronaldo fizer os 12 cheques pr-datados de um milho, eu assino o contrato. J falei, mas ningum acredita. Eu no negociei com o Adriano, com a Roma ou com o Gilmar. Isso coisa do Ronaldo, que amigo dele", falou o mandatrio.
Mas Andrs Sanches mostrou estar por dentro da situao de Adriano na Roma. O atacante tem contrato at 2012 na Itlia, mas segundo o presidente do Corinthians o Imperador no est recebendo em dia na Europa.
"Pergunta para o Adriano quanto ele recebeu j. Falam do futebol brasileiro, mas o futebol europeu tambm no paga", emendou o presidente do Timo.
Na entrevista de mais de uma hora na Rdio Globo, Sanches afirmou tambm que o Corinthians est atrs de mais um meia (que jogue pela direita), de outro centroavante e de um zagueiro mais experiente para a disputa da Libertadores.

description.hltext_display: Janet C. Hollis
description.content:
surrounded by family. She was 79.
She was born May 4, 1931, in Mansfield Township, to the late John and Mary (Kelvey) Narouski.
Janet was a resident of Pemberton Township for more than 30 years.
She worked as a housekeeper at Buttonwood Hospital.
She enjoyed playing cards, doing word puzzles and spending time with her family.
Janet was the loving wife of 47 years to Melton R. Hollis Sr., who passed away in 2002; and the loving mother of the late Melton R. Hollis Jr., and an infant son at birth. She also was preceded in death by her brother, John Narouski; and sisters, Mary Grover, Betty Regan, Florence Smith, Ann Bowker, Elsie Vaughn, and Katherine Narouski. She leaves to mourn her passing three sons, John Hollis (Violet) of Browns Mills, Charles and Ralph Hollis of Pemberton; five daughters, Elaine Hollis of Willingboro, Katherine Johnson (Aaron) of Pensacola, Fla., Virginia Ely (George) of Wrightstown, Doreen O'Neal (Connie) of Riley, N.C., Trudy Locke (Ronald Hopkins) of Wrightstown; thirteen grandchildren, Geneva Moss, Frank Queeman, Kiana Queeman, Sherry Hollis, Stiphin and Shane Small, Edward Hollis, Steven Burt, Janet and Holly Locke, Jason Coleman, Essence and Connie O'Neal; 17 great-grandchildren; and a host of nieces, nephews, and friends.

description.hltext_display: MundoVenezuela aprova lei sobre fidelidade partidria
description.content:
A maioria governista do Parlamento venezuelano aprovou nesta tera-feira uma reforma radical na legislao partidria, que prev a perda de mandato para os legisladores que ignorarem "as orientaes e posies polticas previstas no programa" de seu partido.
Segundo a lei, "constitui fraude eleitoral qualquer conduta que se afaste das orientaes e posies polticas apresentadas no programa partidrio".
A lei tambm proibe a sada do deputado da "organizao poltica ou social pela qual se elegeu para integrar ou formar outro grupo parlamentar".
A medida prev "a suspenso (do cargo) ou a inabilitao (para exercer cargo pblico) do deputado ou deputada enquadrados na nova lei, aps solicitao popular ou legislativa...".
" uma lei que garante ao povo venezuelano que o deputado eleito no ir tra-lo", explicou a deputada governista Iris Varela.
J o opositor Simn Calzadilla qualificou a medida de "retrocesso histrico na democracia venezuelana". "Isto viola terrivelmente o esprito de nossa Constituio".
Segundo a Constituio venezuelana, os deputados "devem prestar contas anualmente de sua gesto aos eleitores (...) e so passveis de um referendo revogatrio" aps a metade do mandato.
A medida aprovada a duas semanas do incio de um novo perodo legislativo, quando o presidente Hugo Chvez j no ter uma ampla maioria no Congresso.
